com.galou.moodtracker.controllers.fragments

Class PageFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.galou.moodtracker.controllers.fragments.PageFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class PageFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Represent a Page Fragment

    Used to instantiate the different Pages of the VerticalViewPager Each pages has it's own background color and drawable but all have the same structure

    A Fragment subclass

      • newInstance

        public static PageFragment newInstance(int color,
                                       int smiley)
        Create a new instance of PageFragment and add it to its bundle
        Parameters:
        color - background color of the fragment
        smiley - smiley of the fragment
        Returns:
        the new fragment with its bundle
        See Also:
        PageAdapter

      • onCreateView

        public android.view.View onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                      android.view.ViewGroup container,
                                      android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Actions executed when the fragment is created

      • inflate fragment with its layout
      • Bind view with ButterKnife
      • get data from the bundle
      • set background color from the color stored in the bundle
      • set the smiley image with the drawable stored in the bundle

Overrides:
onCreateView in class android.support.v4.app.Fragment
Parameters:
inflater - layout inflater
container - fragment container
savedInstanceState - saved state of the fragment
Returns:
view inflated
